response.overview: Marvel's Daredevil is a gritty Netflix series (now on Disney+) about blind lawyer Matt Murdock, who uses his superhuman senses from a childhood accident to fight crime in Hell's Kitchen as a masked vigilante by night, balancing his legal work with his brutal nighttime crusade against organized crime, particularly the rise of Kingpin (Wilson Fisk), while dealing with intense themes, martial arts action, and complex morality.
response.tagline: The devil's work is never done
response.title: Daredevil (TV Series 2015–2018)
